title: Chocolate-Dipped Cutie Segments
directions: Peel the cutie and separate the segments.
Melt chocolate chips in the microwave in 20-30 second bursts, stirring in between.
Dip segments halfway into the melted chocolate.
Optionally sprinkle with sea salt, chopped nuts, or crushed graham cracker.
Set on parchment paper and chill in the fridge until firm, about 10-15 minutes.
notes: Fast, fresh, and indulgent. Great for satisfying a quick chocolate-orange craving. Can use any toppings you have on hand.
